t.id, t.org_number, t.name, t.org_account, t.org_password, t.context, t.capital, t.up_time, t.city, t.icp_filing, t.representative, t.contact, t.platform_ico, t.platformlist_ico, t.platform_detail_img, t.business_license, t.recommend, t.grade, t.top, t.homepage_sort, t.status, t.remark, t.create_time, t.update_time, t.min_profit, t.max_profit, t.min_fee_ratio, t.max_fee_ratio, t.min_dead_line, t.max_dead_line, t.dead_line_min_self_defined, t.dead_line_max_self_defined, t.org_url, t.org_product_url, t.org_usercenter_url, t.org_bind_user_url, t.org_user_exist_url, t.org_userbalance_url, t.trusteeship, t.org_profile, t.org_security, t.org_fee_ratio, t.org_fee_type, t.org_amount_limit, t.org_investdeadline_limit, t.org_creator, t.org_updater, t.org_isstaticproduct, t.org_advertisement, t.org_advantage, t.org_tag, t.org_product_tag, t.org_invest_strategy, t.org_planner_strategy, t.org_invest_tag, t.org_planner_tag, t.org_planner_product_tag, t.org_joint_type, t.org_withdraw_deposit_url, t.org_recharge_url, t.org_url_skip_index, t.org_url_skip_product_buy_record, t.org_url_skip_recharge_record, t.org_url_skip_withdraw_deposit_record, t.org_url_skip_safe_center, t.org_url_skip_activity, t.org_url_skip_bankcard_recharge_limit, t.org_url_skip_official_notice, t.org_url_skip_product_buy_compact, t.org_url_skip_redpackage, t.org_url_skip_coupon, t.org_url_skip_concession_score, t.org_url_skip_jump_type, t.org_product_url_skip_bind_type,

mapper.select: select from tcim_org_info where 1=1
select from tcim_org_info where 1=1
select org_product_url, org_usercenter_url, org_withdraw_deposit_url, org_recharge_url from tcim_org_info where org_number = #{orgNo}

UPDATE tcim_org_info
name = #{name},
org_password = #{orgPassword},
context = #{context},
capital = #{capital},
up_time = #{upTime},
city = #{city},
icp_filing = #{icpFiling},
representative = #{representative},
contact = #{contact},
platform_ico = #{platformIco},
platformlist_ico = #{platformlistIco},
platform_detail_img = #{platformDetailImg},
business_license = #{businessLicense},
recommend = #{recommend},
grade = #{grade},
top = #{top},
homepage_sort = #{homepageSort},
status = #{status},
remark = #{remark},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
min_profit = #{minProfit},
max_profit = #{maxProfit},
min_fee_ratio = #{minFeeRatio},
max_fee_ratio = #{maxFeeRatio},
min_dead_line = #{minDeadLine},
max_dead_line = #{maxDeadLine},
dead_line_min_self_defined = #{deadLineMinSelfDefined},
dead_line_max_self_defined = #{deadLineMaxSelfDefined},
org_url = #{orgUrl},
org_product_url = #{orgProductUrl},
org_usercenter_url = #{orgUsercenterUrl},
org_bind_user_url = #{orgBindUserUrl},

org_recharge_url = #{orgRechargeUrl},
trusteeship = #{trusteeship},

org_advantage = #{orgAdvantage},
org_tag = #{orgTag},

org_url_skip_recharge_record = #{orgUrlSkipRechargeRecord},
org_url_skip_withdraw_deposit_record = #{orgUrlSkipWithdrawDepositRecord},

org_url_skip_official_notice = #{orgUrlSkipOfficialNotice},
org_url_skip_product_buy_compact = #{orgUrlSkipProductBuyCompact},
org_url_skip_redpackage = #{orgUrlSkipRedpackage},

id = #{id}

UPDATE tcim_org_info
name = #{name},
org_password = #{orgPassword},
context = #{context},
capital = #{capital},
up_time = #{upTime},
city = #{city},
icp_filing = #{icpFiling},
representative = #{representative},
contact = #{contact},
platform_ico = #{platformIco},
platformlist_ico = #{platformlistIco},
platform_detail_img = #{platformDetailImg},
business_license = #{businessLicense},
recommend = #{recommend},
grade = #{grade},
top = #{top},
homepage_sort = #{homepageSort},
status = #{status},
remark = #{remark},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
min_profit = #{minProfit},
max_profit = #{maxProfit},
min_fee_ratio = #{minFeeRatio},
max_fee_ratio = #{maxFeeRatio},
min_dead_line = #{minDeadLine},
max_dead_line = #{maxDeadLine},
dead_line_min_self_defined = #{deadLineMinSelfDefined},
dead_line_max_self_defined = #{deadLineMaxSelfDefined},
org_url = #{orgUrl},
org_product_url = #{orgProductUrl},
org_usercenter_url = #{orgUsercenterUrl},
org_bind_user_url = #{orgBindUserUrl},
org_userbalance_url = #{orgUserbalanceUrl},
org_user_exist_url = #{orgUserExistUrl},
org_withdraw_deposit_url = #{orgWithdrawDepositUrl},
org_recharge_url = #{orgRechargeUrl},
trusteeship = #{trusteeship},
org_profile = #{orgProfile},
org_security = #{orgSecurity},
org_fee_ratio = #{orgFeeRatio},
org_fee_type = #{orgFeeType},
org_amount_limit = #{orgAmountLimit},
org_investdeadline_limit = #{orgInvestdeadlineLimit},
org_creator = #{orgCreator},
org_updater = #{orgUpdater},
org_isstaticproduct = #{orgIsstaticproduct},
org_advertisement = #{orgAdvertisement},
org_advantage = #{orgAdvantage},
org_tag = #{orgTag},
org_product_tag = #{orgProductTag},
org_url_skip_index = #{orgUrlSkipIndex},
org_url_skip_product_buy_record = #{orgUrlSkipProductBuyRecord},
org_url_skip_recharge_record = #{orgUrlSkipRechargeRecord},
org_url_skip_withdraw_deposit_record = #{orgUrlSkipWithdrawDepositRecord},
org_url_skip_safe_center = #{orgUrlSkipSafeCenter},
org_url_skip_activity = #{orgUrlSkipActivity},
org_url_skip_bankcard_recharge_limit = #{orgUrlSkipBankcardRechargeLimit},
org_url_skip_official_notice = #{orgUrlSkipOfficialNotice},
org_url_skip_product_buy_compact = #{orgUrlSkipProductBuyCompact},
org_url_skip_redpackage = #{orgUrlSkipRedpackage},
org_url_skip_coupon = #{orgUrlSkipCoupon},
org_url_skip_concession_score = #{orgUrlSkipConcessionScore},
org_url_skip_jump_type = #{orgUrlSkipJumpType},
org_product_url_skip_bind_type = #{orgProductUrlSkipBindType},
org_number = #{orgNumber}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM tcim_org_info
name LIKE CONCAT('%','${dt.search.value}','%' )
${item.name} ${item.dir}

SELECT o.org_number, o.name, o.platform_ico, o.platformlist_ico,
CASE o.grade WHEN 1 THEN 'B' WHEN 2 THEN 'BB' WHEN 3 THEN 'BBB' WHEN 4 THEN 'A' WHEN 5 THEN 'AA' WHEN 6 THEN 'AAA' ELSE '未定义' END grade,
o.min_profit, o.max_profit, o.min_dead_line, o.max_dead_line, o.org_url, o.min_fee_ratio, o.max_fee_ratio, o.dead_line_min_self_defined, o.dead_line_max_self_defined, o.org_fee_ratio, o.org_advantage, o.org_tag, o.org_product_tag, o.org_invest_tag, o.org_planner_tag, o.org_planner_product_tag, o.org_advertisement, o.org_advertisement_url, o.org_withdraw_deposit_url, o.org_recharge_url, o.pc_platform_img, o.pc_platform_list_img, o.pc_platform_detail_img, COUNT(p.org_number) usable_product_nums FROM tcim_org_info o LEFT JOIN tcim_product p ON o.org_number = p.org_number AND p.`status` = 1 WHERE o.`status` = 1
AND o.org_gray_status IN (0,1)
AND o.org_gray_status = 0
AND o.city NOT IN
#{cty.configValue}
AND o.city LIKE CONCAT('%','${city}','%' )
AND o.context LIKE CONCAT('%','${background}','%' )
AND o.grade ${securityLevel}
AND ( (o.min_dead_line <= #{minDeadLine} AND o.max_dead_line >= #{maxDeadLine}) OR (o.min_dead_line >= #{minDeadLine} AND o.min_dead_line <= #{maxDeadLine}) OR (o.max_dead_line >= #{minDeadLine} AND o.max_dead_line <= #{maxDeadLine}) OR (o.min_dead_line >= #{minDeadLine} AND o.max_dead_line <= #{maxDeadLine}) )
AND ( (o.min_profit <= #{minYearProfit} AND o.max_profit >= #{maxYearProfit}) OR (o.min_profit >= #{minYearProfit} AND o.min_profit <= #{maxYearProfit}) OR (o.max_profit >= #{minYearProfit} AND o.max_profit <= #{maxYearProfit}) OR (o.min_profit >= #{minYearProfit} AND o.max_profit <= #{maxYearProfit}) )
GROUP BY o.org_number ORDER BY o.top

SELECT t.platform_detail_img, t.org_number, t.`name`, t.platform_ico, t.platformlist_ico,
CASE t.grade WHEN 1 THEN 'B' WHEN 2 THEN 'BB' WHEN 3 THEN 'BBB' WHEN 4 THEN 'A' WHEN 5 THEN 'AA' WHEN 6 THEN 'AAA' ELSE '未定义' END grade,
t.org_url, t.context, t.capital, t.city, t.icp_filing, t.up_time, t.min_profit, t.max_profit, t.min_dead_line, t.max_dead_line, t.trusteeship, t.org_profile, t.org_security, t.min_fee_ratio, t.max_fee_ratio, t.dead_line_max_self_defined, t.dead_line_min_self_defined, t.org_fee_type, t.org_amount_limit, t.org_investdeadline_limit, t.org_isstaticproduct, t.org_advantage, t.org_tag, t.org_product_tag, t.org_invest_strategy, t.org_planner_strategy, t.org_honor, t.org_joint_type, t.org_fee_ratio_limit, t.org_fee_ratio, t.share_title, t.share_desc, t.share_icon, t.share_link, t.product_release_time, t.recharge_limit_description, t.recharge_limit_title, t.recharge_limit_link_url, t.interest_time, t.withdrawal_charges, t.cash_in_time, t.invest_others, t.contact, t.is_cpa_and_cps,
t.org_withdraw_deposit_url, t.org_recharge_url, t.org_url_skip_index, t.org_url_skip_product_buy_record, t.org_url_skip_recharge_record, t.org_url_skip_withdraw_deposit_record, t.org_url_skip_safe_center, t.org_url_skip_activity, t.org_url_skip_bankcard_recharge_limit, t.org_url_skip_official_notice, t.org_url_skip_product_buy_compact, t.org_url_skip_redpackage, t.org_url_skip_coupon, t.org_url_skip_concession_score, t.org_product_url_skip_bind_type,
t1.org_icon, t1.org_membergrade, t1.org_membername, t1.org_describe FROM tcim_org_info t LEFT JOIN tcim_org_memberinfo t1
ON t.id = t1.orgid
WHERE t.org_number = #{orgNo} ORDER BY t1.sort

SELECT t.org_number, t.`name`,
CASE t.grade WHEN 1 THEN 'B' WHEN 2 THEN 'BB' WHEN 3 THEN 'BBB' WHEN 4 THEN 'A' WHEN 5 THEN 'AA' WHEN 6 THEN 'AAA' ELSE '未定义' END grade,
t.org_url, t.context, t.capital, t.city, t.icp_filing, t.up_time, t.min_profit, t.max_profit, t.min_dead_line, t.max_dead_line, t.trusteeship, t.org_profile, t.org_security, t.min_fee_ratio, t.max_fee_ratio, t.dead_line_max_self_defined, t.dead_line_min_self_defined, t.org_fee_type, t.org_amount_limit, t.org_investdeadline_limit, t.org_isstaticproduct, t.org_advantage, t.org_tag, t.org_product_tag, t.org_invest_tag, t.org_invest_strategy, t.org_planner_strategy, t.org_debenture_transfer, t.org_bid_security, t.org_security_mode, t.org_website_records, t.org_contact_details, t.org_investigation_report, t.org_investigation_report_url, t.org_joint_type, t.pc_platform_img, t.pc_platform_list_img, t.pc_platform_detail_img,
t.org_withdraw_deposit_url, t.org_recharge_url, t.org_url_skip_index, t.org_url_skip_product_buy_record, t.org_url_skip_recharge_record, t.org_url_skip_withdraw_deposit_record, t.org_url_skip_safe_center, t.org_url_skip_activity, t.org_url_skip_bankcard_recharge_limit, t.org_url_skip_official_notice, t.org_url_skip_product_buy_compact, t.org_url_skip_redpackage, t.org_url_skip_coupon, t.org_url_skip_concession_score, t.org_product_url_skip_bind_type,
t1.org_icon, t1.org_membergrade, t1.org_membername, t1.org_describe FROM tcim_org_info t LEFT JOIN tcim_org_memberinfo t1 ON t.id = t1.orgid WHERE t.org_number = #{orgNumber} ORDER BY t1.sort

SELECT org_number,name,org_url,platform_ico
FROM tcim_org_info WHERE 1 = 1
AND org_gray_status IN (0,1)
AND org_gray_status = 0
AND `status` = 1 AND recommend = 1 AND homepage_sort IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY homepage_sort LIMIT 10

SELECT o.platformlist_ico, o.org_number, o.name, o.pc_platform_img, o.pc_platform_list_img, o.pc_platform_detail_img, CASE o.grade WHEN 1 THEN 'B' WHEN 2 THEN 'BB' WHEN 3 THEN 'BBB' WHEN 4 THEN 'A' WHEN 5 THEN 'AA' WHEN 6 THEN 'AAA' ELSE '未定义' END grade,
o.min_profit, o.max_profit, o.min_dead_line, o.max_dead_line, o.min_fee_ratio, o.max_fee_ratio, o.dead_line_min_self_defined, o.dead_line_max_self_defined, o.org_advertisement, o.org_advertisement_url, COUNT(p.org_number) usable_product_nums FROM tcim_org_info o LEFT JOIN tcim_product p ON o.org_number = p.org_number AND p.`status` = 1 WHERE o.`status` = 1
AND o.org_gray_status IN (0,1)
AND o.org_gray_status = 0
AND o.recommend = 1 AND o.homepage_sort IS NOT NULL GROUP BY o.org_number ORDER BY o.homepage_sort

SELECT o.org_number, o.name, o.org_profile, o.org_newest_img, CASE o.grade WHEN 1 THEN 'B' WHEN 2 THEN 'BB' WHEN 3 THEN 'BBB' WHEN 4 THEN 'A' WHEN 5 THEN 'AA' WHEN 6 THEN 'AAA' ELSE '未定义' END grade
FROM tcim_org_info o WHERE o.`status` = 1
AND o.org_gray_status IN (0,1)
AND o.org_gray_status = 0
ORDER BY o.create_time DESC LIMIT 8

SELECT o.name as org_name,o.org_number, o.platformlist_ico ,org_advertisement,o.org_isstaticproduct,o.cooperation_end_url,o.status, CASE o.grade WHEN 1 THEN 'B' WHEN 2 THEN 'BB' WHEN 3 THEN 'BBB' WHEN 4 THEN 'A' WHEN 5 THEN 'AA' WHEN 6 THEN 'AAA' ELSE '未定义' END grade, o.min_profit, o.max_profit, o.min_dead_line, o.max_dead_line, o.dead_line_min_self_defined, o.dead_line_max_self_defined, IFNULL(b.investAmount,0) investAmount ,IFNULL(b.investCount,0) investCount,IFNULL(b.totalProfix,0) totalProfix, (select count(1) from tcim_product p where p.org_number = o.org_number AND p.`status` = 1 ) as usableProductNums, a.org_account, a.is_invested,a.is_new_user,a.creat_time from tcim_org_info o LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * from tcrm_org_acct_rel r where r.user_id=#{userId} ) a on o.org_number = a.org_number LEFT JOIN (SELECT sum(invest_amt) investAmount, count(1) investCount, sum(accurate_profit) totalProfix, platfrom,max(create_time) investTime from tcim_product_invest_record where user_id =#{userId} GROUP BY platfrom) b on o.org_number=b.platfrom where 1=1
and o.org_isstaticproduct=0
and o.status IN(0,1) and a.org_account is not null
AND o.org_gray_status IN (0,1)
AND o.org_gray_status = 0
and o.status = 1 and a.org_account is null
AND o.org_gray_status IN (0,1)
AND o.org_gray_status = 0
and (o.status = 1 and a.org_account is null) or (o.status IN(0,1) and a.org_account is not null)
ORDER BY b.investTime desc, o.id

SELECT o.name as org_name,o.org_number,o.status, IFNULL(b.investAmount,0) investAmount ,IFNULL(b.investCount,0) investCount,IFNULL(b.totalProfix,0) totalProfix FROM tcim_org_info o LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * from tcrm_org_acct_rel r where r.user_id = #{userId} ) a on o.org_number = a.org_number LEFT JOIN (SELECT sum(invest_amt) investAmount, count(1) investCount, sum(accurate_profit) totalProfix, platfrom FROM tcim_product_invest_record where user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY platfrom) b on o.org_number=b.platfrom WHERE 1=1
AND o.org_isstaticproduct = 0 AND o. STATUS IN(0,1) AND a.org_account IS NOT NULL ORDER BY b.investCount DESC, o.id

SELECT count(1) FROM tcim_org_info o LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM tcrm_org_acct_rel r WHERE r.user_id =#{userId} ) a ON o.org_number = a.org_number LEFT JOIN ( SELECT count(1) investCount, platfrom FROM tcim_product_invest_record WHERE user_id =#{userId} GROUP BY platfrom ) b ON o.org_number = b.platfrom WHERE 1 = 1 AND o.org_isstaticproduct = 0
AND o.org_gray_status IN (0,1)
AND o.org_gray_status = 0
AND o. STATUS = 1 AND a.org_account IS NULL
SELECT count(1) FROM tcrm_org_acct_rel r LEFT JOIN tcim_org_info t ON r.org_number = t.org_number WHERE r.user_id =#{userId} and t.status IN(0,1) and t.org_isstaticproduct = 0
SELECT count(1) FROM tcim_org_info where status=1 and org_isstaticproduct=0
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO tcrm_org_acct_rel
id,
user_id,
org_number,
org_account,
org_account_type,
is_invested,
is_new_user,
creat_time,
update_time,
#{id},
#{userId},
#{orgNumber},
#{orgAccount},
#{orgAccountType},
#{isInvested},
#{isNewUser},
#{creatTime},
#{updateTime},
mapper.select: SELECT count(1) FROM tcrm_org_acct_rel r WHERE r.user_id =#{userId} and r.org_number=#{platFromNumber}
SELECT org_account FROM tcrm_org_acct_rel r WHERE r.user_id =#{userId} and r.org_number=#{orgNo}
SELECT user_id FROM tcrm_org_acct_rel r WHERE r.org_account =#{thirdOrgAccount} and r.org_number=#{orgNo}
SELECT log_id FROM tcrm_investor_login_log WHERE user_id =#{userId} order by create_time desc limit 1
SELECT org_number orgNumber,name orgName FROM tcim_org_info WHERE `status` = #{status} AND org_isstaticproduct = 1
mapper.update: update tcrm_org_acct_rel set is_invested=1 where user_id=#{userId} and org_number=#{orgNumber}
mapper.select:
SELECT t.id, t.org_number, t.`name`, t.org_account, t.org_password, t.recommend, t.`status`,
CASE t.grade WHEN 1 THEN 'B' WHEN 2 THEN 'BB' WHEN 3 THEN 'BBB' WHEN 4 THEN 'A' WHEN 5 THEN 'AA' WHEN 6 THEN 'AAA' ELSE '未定义' END grade,
t.org_url, t.contact, t.representative, t.context, t.capital, t.city, t.icp_filing, t.up_time, t.min_profit, t.max_profit, t.min_dead_line, t.max_dead_line, t.trusteeship, t.org_profile, t.org_security, t.platform_ico, t.platformlist_ico, t.platform_detail_img, t.business_license, t.min_fee_ratio, t.max_fee_ratio, t.org_fee_ratio, t.org_product_url, t.org_usercenter_url, t.org_bind_user_url, t.org_userbalance_url, t.org_user_exist_url, t.org_fee_type, t.org_isstaticproduct, t.org_advertisement,
t.org_withdraw_deposit_url, t.org_recharge_url, t.org_url_skip_index, t.org_url_skip_product_buy_record, t.org_url_skip_recharge_record, t.org_url_skip_withdraw_deposit_record, t.org_url_skip_safe_center, t.org_url_skip_activity, t.org_url_skip_bankcard_recharge_limit, t.org_url_skip_official_notice, t.org_url_skip_product_buy_compact, t.org_url_skip_redpackage, t.org_url_skip_coupon, t.org_url_skip_concession_score, t.org_product_url_skip_bind_type,
t1.tid, t1.org_icon, t1.org_membergrade, t1.org_membername, t1.org_describe FROM tcim_org_info t LEFT JOIN tcim_org_memberinfo t1
ON t.id = t1.orgid WHERE t.org_number = #{orgNumber}
SELECT IFNULL(is_new_user,1) FROM tcrm_org_acct_rel WHERE user_id=#{userId} AND org_number=#{orgNumber}
SELECT org_number orgNumber, org_fee_type orgFeeType, org_amount_limit orgAmountLimit, org_investdeadline_limit orgInvestdeadlineLimit FROM tcim_org_info WHERE org_number = #{orgNumber}

SELECT t.* FROM ( SELECT o.org_number, o.name, o.platform_ico,
CASE o.grade WHEN 1 THEN 'B' WHEN 2 THEN 'BB' WHEN 3 THEN 'BBB' WHEN 4 THEN 'A' WHEN 5 THEN 'AA' WHEN 6 THEN 'AAA' ELSE '未定义' END grade,
o.min_profit, o.max_profit, o.min_dead_line, o.max_dead_line, o.dead_line_min_self_defined, o.dead_line_max_self_defined, o.org_fee_ratio, o.org_advantage, o.org_tag, o.org_product_tag, o.org_invest_tag, o.org_planner_tag, COUNT(p.org_number) usable_product_nums FROM tcim_org_info o LEFT JOIN tcim_product p ON o.org_number = p.org_number AND p.`status` = 1 WHERE o.`status` = 1 GROUP BY o.org_number
) t
INNER JOIN tcim_org_ref t1 ON t.org_number = t1. org_number WHERE 1=1 AND t1.investor_user_id = #{investUserId} AND t1.sale_user_id = #{saleUserId} ORDER BY t1.recommend_time DESC

SELECT t.* FROM ( SELECT o.org_number, o.name, o.platformlist_ico,
CASE o.grade WHEN 1 THEN 'B' WHEN 2 THEN 'BB' WHEN 3 THEN 'BBB' WHEN 4 THEN 'A' WHEN 5 THEN 'AA' WHEN 6 THEN 'AAA' ELSE '未定义' END grade,
o.min_profit, o.max_profit, o.min_dead_line, o.max_dead_line, o.dead_line_min_self_defined, o.dead_line_max_self_defined, o.org_advertisement, o.org_advertisement_url, o.org_invest_tag, o.org_planner_tag, COUNT(p.org_number) usable_product_nums FROM tcim_org_info o LEFT JOIN tcim_product p ON o.org_number = p.org_number AND p.`status` = 1 WHERE o.`status` = 1 GROUP BY o.org_number
) t
INNER JOIN tcim_org_ref t1 ON t.org_number = t1. org_number WHERE 1=1 AND t1.investor_user_id = #{investUserId} AND t1.sale_user_id = #{saleUserId} ORDER BY t1.recommend_time DESC
SELECT toi.org_invest_strategy AS orgInvestStrategy, toi.org_planner_strategy AS orgPlannerStrategy FROM tcim_org_info toi WHERE toi.org_number = #{orgCode} AND toi.`status` = 1

select from tcim_org_info where 1=1 and status = 1
and grade ${securityLevel}
AND org_gray_status = 0
ORDER BY top ASC

SELECT
COUNT(p.org_number) usable_product_nums
FROM tcim_product p ,tcim_product_statistics tps WHERE p.org_number = #{orgNumber} AND p.product_id = tps.product_id
AND p.status = 1 AND p.audit_status = 1 AND p.buy_total_money > tps.buyed_total_money GROUP BY p.org_number

SELECT o.org_number, o.name, o.platform_ico, o.platformlist_ico,
CASE o.grade WHEN 1 THEN 'B' WHEN 2 THEN 'BB' WHEN 3 THEN 'BBB' WHEN 4 THEN 'A' WHEN 5 THEN 'AA' WHEN 6 THEN 'AAA' ELSE '未定义' END grade,
o.min_profit, o.max_profit, o.min_dead_line, o.max_dead_line, o.org_url, o.min_fee_ratio, o.max_fee_ratio, o.dead_line_min_self_defined, o.dead_line_max_self_defined, o.org_fee_ratio, o.org_advantage, o.org_tag, o.org_product_tag, o.org_invest_tag, o.org_planner_tag, o.org_planner_product_tag, o.org_advertisement, o.org_advertisement_url, o.pc_platform_img, o.pc_platform_list_img, o.pc_platform_detail_img
FROM tcim_org_info o LEFT JOIN tcim_product_cate p ON o.org_number = p.major_recommendation_platform WHERE o.`status` = 1 AND p.cate_name LIKE '短期产品'
AND o.org_gray_status IN (0,1)
AND o.org_gray_status = 0
GROUP BY o.org_number

SELECT o.org_number, o.name, o.platform_ico, o.platformlist_ico,
CASE o.grade WHEN 1 THEN 'B' WHEN 2 THEN 'BB' WHEN 3 THEN 'BBB' WHEN 4 THEN 'A' WHEN 5 THEN 'AA' WHEN 6 THEN 'AAA' ELSE '未定义' END grade,
o.min_profit, o.max_profit, o.min_dead_line, o.max_dead_line, o.org_url, o.min_fee_ratio, o.max_fee_ratio, o.dead_line_min_self_defined, o.dead_line_max_self_defined, o.org_fee_ratio, o.org_advantage, o.org_tag, o.org_product_tag, o.org_invest_tag, o.org_planner_tag, o.org_planner_product_tag, o.org_advertisement, o.org_advertisement_url, o.pc_platform_img, o.pc_platform_list_img, o.pc_platform_detail_img
FROM tcim_org_info o LEFT JOIN tcim_product_cate p ON o.org_number = p.major_recommendation_platform WHERE o.`status` = 1 AND p.cate_name LIKE '中长期产品'
AND o.org_gray_status IN (0,1)
AND o.org_gray_status = 0
GROUP BY o.org_number

SELECT o.org_number, o.name, o.platform_ico, o.platformlist_ico,
CASE o.grade WHEN 1 THEN 'B' WHEN 2 THEN 'BB' WHEN 3 THEN 'BBB' WHEN 4 THEN 'A' WHEN 5 THEN 'AA' WHEN 6 THEN 'AAA' ELSE '未定义' END grade,
o.min_profit, o.max_profit, o.min_dead_line, o.max_dead_line, o.org_url, o.min_fee_ratio, o.max_fee_ratio, o.dead_line_min_self_defined, o.dead_line_max_self_defined, o.org_fee_ratio, o.org_advantage, o.org_tag, o.org_product_tag, o.org_invest_tag, o.org_planner_tag, o.org_planner_product_tag, o.org_advertisement, o.org_advertisement_url, o.pc_platform_img, o.pc_platform_list_img, o.pc_platform_detail_img
FROM tcim_org_info o LEFT JOIN tcim_product_cate p ON o.org_number = p.major_recommendation_platform WHERE o.`status` = 1 AND p.cate_name LIKE '高收益产品'
AND o.org_gray_status IN (0,1)
AND o.org_gray_status = 0
GROUP BY o.org_number
SELECT DISTINCT (toi.org_fee_ratio) AS feeType FROM tcim_org_info toi WHERE toi.`status` = 1 AND toi.org_fee_ratio > 0 AND toi.org_gray_status = 0 ORDER BY toi.org_fee_ratio ASC

SELECT toi.org_number AS orgNumber, toi.name AS name, toi.org_tag AS orgTag, toi.list_recommend AS listRecommend, toi.org_advantage AS orgAdvantage, CASE toi.grade WHEN 1 THEN 'B' WHEN 2 THEN 'BB' WHEN 3 THEN 'BBB' WHEN 4 THEN 'A' WHEN 5 THEN 'AA' WHEN 6 THEN 'AAA' ELSE '未定义' END AS grade, toi.org_fee_ratio AS orgFeeRatio, toi.platformlist_ico AS platformlistIco, ( SELECT COUNT(tp.id) FROM tcim_product tp, tcim_product_statistics tps WHERE tp.org_number = toi.org_number AND tp. STATUS = 1 AND tp.audit_status = 1 AND tp.product_id = tps.product_id AND tp.buy_total_money > tps.buyed_total_money ) AS usableProductNums, CONCAT( TRUNCATE ( ( SELECT IFNULL( ( MAX(tp.flow_max_rate) + MIN(tp.flow_min_rate) ) / 2, 0 ) FROM tcim_product tp WHERE tp.org_number = toi.org_number AND tp.audit_status = 1 AND tp.sale_start_time <= NOW() AND tp.sale_start_time >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 360 DAY) ), 2 ) ) AS averageRate, IF ( toi.list_recommend = 1, toi.homepage_sort, toi.top ) AS sortIndex FROM tcim_org_info toi WHERE toi.`status` = 1
AND toi.org_gray_status = 0
ORDER BY toi.list_recommend DESC, sortIndex ASC

SELECT CONCAT(truncate(IFNULL(SUM(tpir.stock_invest_amt),0),2),'') AS investingAmt, CONCAT(truncate(IFNULL(SUM(tpir.profit),0),2),'') AS investingProfit, CONCAT(truncate(IFNULL(SUM(tpir.stock_invest_amt),0),2),'') AS investAmt FROM tcim_product_invest_record tpir, tcrm_org_acct_rel toar, tcim_org_info toi WHERE tpir.STATUS IN (1, 2, 4) AND toar.user_id = tpir.user_id AND tpir.platfrom = toi.org_number AND toar.org_number = tpir.platfrom
AND toi.org_gray_status IN (0,1)
AND toi.org_gray_status = 0
AND toi. STATUS = 1 AND tpir.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT CONCAT( truncate(SUM(IFNULL(tpir.stock_invest_amt, 0)),2), '' ) AS investingAmt, SUM(IFNULL(tpir.stock_invest_amt, 0)) AS investAmt, CONCAT( truncate(SUM(IFNULL(tpir.profit, 0)),2), '' ) AS investingProfit, temp.orgUrlSkipJumpType, temp.orgUsercenterUrl AS orgUsercenterUrl, temp.orgProductUrlSkipBindType AS orgProductUrlSkipBindType, temp.platformLogo AS platformLogo, temp.orgAccount AS orgAccount, temp.orgNumber AS orgNumber, temp.orgName AS orgName, temp.orgKey AS orgKey, temp.orgSecret AS orgSecret FROM ( SELECT toi.org_product_url_skip_bind_type AS orgProductUrlSkipBindType, toi.org_url_skip_jump_type AS orgUrlSkipJumpType, toi.org_usercenter_url AS orgUsercenterUrl, toi.platformlist_ico AS platformLogo, toar.org_account AS orgAccount, toi.org_number AS orgNumber, toi. NAME AS orgName, toar.creat_time AS createTime, toar.user_id AS userId, ttc.org_key AS orgKey, ttc.org_secret AS orgSecret FROM tcrm_org_acct_rel toar, tcim_org_info toi, tsys_thirdkey_config ttc WHERE toar.org_number = toi.org_number
AND toi.org_gray_status IN (0,1)
AND toi.org_gray_status = 0
AND toi. STATUS = 1 AND toar.user_id = #{userId} AND ttc.org_number = toi.org_number ) temp LEFT JOIN tcim_product_invest_record tpir ON tpir. STATUS IN (1, 2, 4) AND tpir.platfrom = temp.orgNumber AND temp.userId = tpir.user_id GROUP BY temp.orgNumber ORDER BY investAmt DESC,temp.createTime DESC
SELECT CONCAT(truncate(IFNULL(SUM(tpir.profit),0),2),'') FROM tcim_product_invest_record tpir, tcim_product tp WHERE tpir.product_id = tp.product_id AND tp.status != 3 AND tpir.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(temp.investAmt), 0) AS investingAmt, IFNULL( SUM( IFNULL(temp.redpacketMoney, 0) ), 0 ) AS redpacketProfit, IFNULL(SUM(temp.platformBouns), 0) AS virtualPaltformBouns, IFNULL(SUM(temp.feeAmountSum), 0) AS totalFeeAmount, temp.productRate AS productRate, temp.productDeadLine AS productDeadLine, temp.productId AS productId FROM ( SELECT tp.flow_min_rate AS productRate, tp.dead_line_min_value AS productDeadLine, tp.product_id AS productId, tpir.invest_amt AS investAmt, tpir.virtual_paltform_bouns AS platformBouns, ( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(tf.fee_amount), 0) AS feeAmountSum FROM tcim_fee tf WHERE tf.profit_cfplanner_id = #{userId} AND tf.bill_id = tpir.invest_id GROUP BY tf.bill_id ) AS feeAmountSum, ( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(trur.money), 0) FROM tact_redpacket_use_record trur WHERE trur.invest_id = tpir.invest_record_no ) AS redpacketMoney FROM tcim_product_invest_record tpir, tcrm_org_acct_rel toar, tcim_org_info toi, tcim_product tp WHERE tpir. STATUS IN (1, 2, 4) AND toar.user_id = tpir.user_id AND tpir.platfrom = toi.org_number AND toar.org_number = tpir.platfrom AND tp.product_id = tpir.product_id
AND toi.org_gray_status IN (0,1)
AND toi.org_gray_status = 0
AND toi. STATUS = 1 AND tpir.user_id = #{userId} ) temp GROUP BY temp.productId
